document_data.name: Brenth Stoutshield
document_data.home: [[Citadel of the Banner Raised Anew]], [[Amn]], [[west Faer√ªn]]
document_data.mainbody: High Marshal '''Brenth Stoutshield''' was a [[halfling]] crusader who came to found and lead the [[Citadel of the Banner Raised Anew]] in [[Amn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Brenth was highly driven and devoted to his cause of building a realm for halflings to live in, free of interference by the taller folk.
document_data.Relationships: The High Marshal built a strong alliance with Major [[Tharundar Olehm (soldier)|Tharundar Olehm]] of [[Hillfort Torbold]], and they worked together to protect their interests.
